1571610384_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: http port 444, ssl port 445, no socks. i2p should read 'Accepting tunnels' before being able to connect to anything. As you already have a 'Peers' list know and integrated peers connection to the i2p network seems to be working fine. Might want to search and add some subscribtions to your address book in the  i2p address book (if I remember correctly some are mentioned on the i2p clearnet web site).
